content: harbour stitches c l a r a p h i l i b e r t b e l l b o m b e r materials notes chain is counted in st count unless otherwise stated 6 mm crochet hook for this pattern #4 worsted weight yarn double_crochet 2 means 2 double_crochet in next stitch same brava worsted stitch approx total yardage 2 double_crochet means 1 double_crochet in each st for 2 xs 1000 yards stitches s/m 1090 yards special m/l 1200 yards xl/2x 1300 yards stitches skip 2 double_crochet 5 chain 2 skip 4 3 double_crochet 5 double crochets are worked in the 3x 1400 yards same stitch to make a bell 4x 1500 yards size chart xs s/m m/l xl/2x 3x 4x chest 28-30 32 36 38 42 44 -50 52 -54 56 -58 length 21 5 22 5 23 5 25 5 26 5 28 5 width 18 5 21 23 5 26 28 5 31 gauge 4 = 14 stitches 7 row in double_crochet www harbourstitches com | @harbourstitches pattern written xs s/m m/l xl/2x 3x 4x starting chain is counted in st count back piece chain 63 73 83 93 103 113 row 1 ch1 single_crochet in every chain turn 63 73 83 93 103 113 row 2 ch3 2 double_crochet *skip 2 double_crochet 5 chain 2 skip 4 3 double_crochet* repeat ** to end of row turn 63 73 83 93 103 113 row 3-33 repeat row 2 63 73 83 93 103 113 size xs continue to last body row size s/m row 34-37 repeat row 2 size m/l row 34-41 repeat row 2 size xl/2x row 34-45 repeat row 2 size 3x row 34-49 repeat row 2 size 4x row 34-53 repeat row 2 for longer length continue repeat row 2 last body row ch1 single_crochet in each st and chain finish off 63 73 83 93 103 113 front piece make 2 chain 23 33 33 43 43 53 row 1 ch1 single_crochet in every chain turn 23 33 33 43 43 53 row 2 ch3 2 double_crochet *skip 2 double_crochet 5 chain 2 skip 4 3 double_crochet* repeat ** to end of row turn 23 33 33 43 43 53 row 3-6 repeat row 2 row 7-9 ch2 double_crochet in each st turn 23 33 33 43 43 53 row 10-14 ch3 2 double_crochet *skip 2 double_crochet 5 chain 2 skip 4 3 double_crochet* repeat ** to end of row turn 23 33 33 43 43 53 row 15 ch2 double_crochet in each st turn 23 33 33 43 43 53 row 16-28 repeat row 15 size xs continue to last texture repeat row size s/m row 29-32 repeat row 15 size m/l row 29-36 repeat row 15 size xl/2x row 29-40 repeat row 15 size 3x row 29-44 repeat row 15 size 4x row 29-48 repeat row 15 for longer length continue repeat row 15 match the repeats with the back piece last texture repeat row 1 ch3
